you-can-pay-by-bank-transfer: You can make a payment via bank transfer to this account
name-and-surname-of-exerciser: name and surname of an exerciser
ni-number: national insurance number (rodné číslo) without the slash
insurance-note: It is possible to apply for a benefit from selected health insurance companies for individual preventive programmes (contribution for regular physical and sports activities). The club will issue a receipt of payment, which you will present to the insurance company. For specific information on the conditions, please contact your health insurance company.
